content.question: (a) Translate the words egregium forma iuvenem et fulgentibus armis (line 2) as literally as possible. (b) These words (eggegium . . . armis) can be applied to a number of other characters whose fate is depicted in Books 7-12. Identify one of these characters and, in two or three sentences, describe what happens to this character in Vergil’s narrative.

frqParts.text: (a) Translate the words egregium forma iuvenem et fulgentibus armis (line 2) as literally as possible. unit.text: 4: Teacher's Choice - Latin Poetry and Vergil's Aeneid, Excerpts from Books 1 and 2
